title: Trump Now Faces 3 Criminal Cases. Here’s the Status of Each
description: Trump has now been charged in three separate criminal cases. Here's the status of each.

title: COVID-19 Cases Are Rising. Should You Get A Booster Shot?
description: A new COVID-19 booster is coming in the fall, but does it make sense to get a booster now?

title: 4 Charts That Show Why AI Progress Is Unlikely to Slow Down
description: Progress in the capabilities of AI systems is predictably driven by progress in three inputs—compute, data, and algorithms.

title: How Offshore Wind Can Supply 25% of U.S. Electricity by 2050
description: The U.S. has enormous offshore wind power potential, according to a new report. But it's going to take a lot of government action to harness it.

title: In Just 7 Months, the World Used an Entire Year’s Worth of Planetary Resources
description: 'Earth Overshoot Day' landed on August 2 this year—one more sign that we're using up earth's resources too quickly.

title: Gilgo Beach Murders Suspect Appears in Court. Here’s What We Know About the Case
description: The evidence against Rex Heuermann, a 59-year-old architect, includes 2,500 documents and hundreds of hours of video footage.

title: Senate Office Buildings Locked Down Over Reports of Shooter
description: The security response was prompted by a “concerning 911 call” regarding a “possible active shooter.”

title: What Prohibition Can Teach Us About Drug and Alcohol Policy Today
description: The repeal of prohibition led to increased drinking by pregnant women, and increased deaths decades later.

title: Here’s How the Stunning Supermoon Looked Around the World
description: Photos of the Aug. 1 Sturgeon Supermoon—from Boston to Brazil.

title: Here’s What We Know About the Alleged Trump Co-Conspirators in the Jan. 6 Indictment
description: The indictment describes outside lawyers, a political consultant and one mid-level Justice Department official as Trump's co-conspirators. Here's what we know about their identities.

title: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and His Wife Are Separating
description: The Canadian PM and his wife announced that they are separating after 18 years of marriage.

title: Lizzo Is Facing a Lawsuit From Three Former Dancers. Here’s What to Know
description: Why three former dancers have filed a lawsuit against Lizzo

title: What to Know About the Fatal Stabbing of O’Shae Sibley
description: The NYPD confirmed to TIME that Sibley's stabbing is being investigated as a “possible biased incident.”

title: Why Ukraine’s Civilian Volunteers Are the Unsung Heroes of the War
description: They often step in and provide equipment and aid when the government is unable to.

title: NATO Nations Beef Up Security After Wagner Fighters Arrive in Belarus
description: Concerns have grown over the arrival of Wagner forces in Belarus after a short-lived mutiny in Russia.

title: What to Know About Jonathan Majors’ Domestic Violence Trial
description: The 33-year-old actor is facing up to a year in jail if he is convicted on misdemeanor charges of assault and harassment

title: Despite Rift With Putin, the Wagner Group’s Global Reach is Growing
description: A new report shared exclusively with TIME shows how Wagner has become a destabilizing global force, particularly in Africa

title: A Wave of Scandals Is Testing the Singaporean Government’s Ability to Take Criticism
description: Singapore’s hamfisted attempts at controlling the narrative could backfire, drawing even more attention to criticism or questions raised in the first place.

title: Pope Francis Lands in Portugal, as Catholic Church Grapples With Abuse Scandal
description: A 500-page report into decades of abuse casts a shadow over the Pope's 5-day trip to mark World Youth Day.

title: What to Know About Ohio’s Abortion Ballot Initiative
description: The ballot initiative would protect abortion rights in the state constitution. But first there's a vote to make that harder to pass.

title: Why We Must Save Ugly Bugs
description: Why we must learn to love insects—even the not-so-cute ones, writes Steve Nicholls.

title: Australia Urged to Extend TikTok Ban to WeChat
description: The proposed ban on government devices is the latest attempt from lawmakers to crack down on potential influence linked to Beijing.

title: Taiwan Detains Army Officer Suspected of Leaking Military Secrets to China
description: The detentions come as military tensions between China and Taiwan continue to rise.

title: California Politicians Ask Taylor Swift to Postpone L.A. Concerts in Solidarity With Striking Hotel Workers
description: California's lieutenant governor and other elected officials urged Swift to postpone her Los Angeles concerts as a way to stand in solidarity with striking hotel workers.
